title: Yoshikawa
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, Marks, and Seal 
 LRC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}; LLC, in grey: [Yoshi Kawa]
description: quiet river with reeds at LR and dock-like structure with tall poles and fishing gear (?) in center; in background, a flat landscape with two buildings nestled among trees; dense trees in background, reflecting on water in foreground; dusk or twilight
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
